name: Milena's manor house
description:
※ All characters in this game are over 18 age.

This story is the love one main character adventure with Witch Milena.

Main character entered rumored forest inhabited by the witch.

He was panicked with that it got dark sooner than he expected, so decided to look for nearby house.

Then, he fined luxury manor house is not suitable for a manor house.

The strange manor house is lived by witch Milena.

[operation]
Move Arrow keys or left click or WASD
Dash Move while holding down the shift key
Menu X key or right click
Skip Left-click and hold

[Battle]
The monsters in the field
If you don't approach them, they won't fight.
Some monsters, such as bosses, are forced to fight.
The game is over when your HP becomes zero.

[Items]
Items can be obtained from light icons and treasure chests on the field.
You can also buy them at stores in each location.
